Meet Matty

Meet Matty! A newcomer to Halcyon this year, he’s a business student at University of Regina. A wiz on the piano, he’ll entertain you with a Chopin Ballad at the drop of a hat.

His favourite part of choir? Getting to better know his choir mates at snack time!
